title: Countries with highest ransomware infection rates 2017 to 2018
yAxis: Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware.
The highest category is found at Thailand where Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware is 9.57.
The lowest category is found at Turkey where Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware is 3.22.
gold: This statistic shows the countries with highest ransomware infection rates from 2017 to 2018 . In the measured period , Thailand had the biggest share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware - 9.57 percent .
